channel.title: Changing the words in the quest and music tab
channel.description: ok im am a littel new at this but i dont know how to change the words in the quest and music tabs or can you only do that with a custom client

item.title: Changing the words in the quest and music tab
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

search for /* QUEST 1 */ in client.java

then ull see something like:

if(questid == 1) { if(q1stage == 0) { loadquest("Invisible Armour", "To start this quest talk with "+GetNpcName(549), "who can be found in Varrock Armour", "shop, good luck.", "", "", "", "", "", ""); } if(q1stage == 1) { loadquest("Invisible Armour", GetNpcName(549)+" has

change where it says invisible armour in quotesâ€¦there u go

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the words in the quest and music tab
